function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity of individuals in apartment buildings during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in close quarters","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and promoting ventilation in shared spaces","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, contactless access systems","People":"Residents of apartment buildings","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High temperature differentials between day and night in the summer","Impact":"Potential discomfort and health risks for individuals spending time on balconies","Mitigation":"Encouraging use of outdoor spaces during cooler times of the day and providing shade and cooling options","Technologies":"Shade structures, misting systems, outdoor fans","People":"Residents using balconies","Owner":"Apartment complex management and local government"},{"Description":"Limited rainfall and dry climate in Konya","Impact":"Risk of dehydration and heat-related illnesses for individuals using balconies","Mitigation":"Promoting hydration and providing shaded areas with access to water","Technologies":"Water misting systems, hydration stations","People":"Residents using balconies","Owner":"Apartment complex management and local government"}]}
